entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF FREEZING DRIZZLE
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE MID 20S IN THE AFTERNOON
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT
MUCH COLDER WITH LOWS AROUND 8 ABOVE
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 4 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 17
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW IN THE MORNING

CLEAR, COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 9 ABOVE
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE UPPER 40S IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
